# orientation

**Type Property**

The orientation of the text.

## Declaration

```swift
static let orientation: NSAttributedString.TextLayoutSectionKey
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutManager/TextLayoutOrientation] value. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutManager/TextLayoutOrientation/horizontal].

## Getting keys for text layouts

- **range**: The character range.
